summary: Configuration container for the Autoformer time‑series forecasting model, encapsulating all architectural and training hyperparameters such as prediction horizon, context length, feature dimensions, transformer layer sizes, attention heads, dropout rates, distribution head, loss type, scaling options, and specialized Autoformer settings like moving‑average window and autocorrelation factor.
business_intent: Allow developers and data scientists to easily define, customize, and instantiate Autoformer models for accurate multi‑step time‑series prediction across various domains.
